mcq.statement: What is the name of the famous diamond that Ranjit Singh wore in his headdress and later became part of the crown jewels in Westminster?
mcq.one_liner: The diamond known as **Koh-e-Noor** was famously worn by Ranjit Singh in his headdress and later became part of the crown jewels in Westminster.
